00037 #include "DataSourceCondition.hpp"
00038 
00039 #include "ConditionInterface.hpp"
00040 
00041 namespace RTT {
00042     using namespace detail;
00043   DataSourceCondition::DataSourceCondition( ConditionInterface* c )
00044       : cond( c ), result(false)
00045   {
00046   }
00047 
00048   DataSourceCondition::DataSourceCondition( const DataSourceCondition& orig )
00049       : cond( orig.condition()->clone() ), result(false)
00050   {
00051   }
00052 
00053   DataSourceCondition::~DataSourceCondition()
00054   {
00055       delete cond;
00056   }
00057 
00058   bool DataSourceCondition::get() const
00059   {
00060       return result = cond->evaluate();
00061   }
00062 
00063   bool DataSourceCondition::value() const
00064   {
00065       return result;
00066   }
00067 
00068   bool const& DataSourceCondition::rvalue() const
00069   {
00070       return result;
00071   }
00072 
00073   ConditionInterface* DataSourceCondition::condition() const
00074   {
00075       return cond;
00076   }
00077 
00078   void DataSourceCondition::reset()
00079   {
00080       result = false;
00081       cond->reset();
00082   }
00083 
00084   DataSourceCondition* DataSourceCondition::clone() const
00085   {
00086       return new DataSourceCondition( cond->clone() );
00087   }
00088 
00089   DataSourceCondition* DataSourceCondition::copy( std::map<const DataSourceBase*, DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const
00090   {
00091       return new DataSourceCondition( cond->copy( alreadyCloned ) );
00092   }
00093 }
